segments.text: Liz , you were supposed to have had those contracts typed up by now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was supposed to do that ? I thought Sharon was responsible for that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , Liz . I asked you specifically . Don ’ t you remember ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m really sorry , Mr . Samuel . I really don ’ t remember that .
segments.speaker: S2
